solution_line_template: In a day, John uses {fan_wattage}x {hours_per_day} = <<{fan_wattage}*{hours_per_day}={daily_watt_hours}>>{daily_watt_hours} watts.
So in a month, he uses {daily_watt_hours} x {days_per_month} = {monthly_watt_hours} watts.
Since there are {watts_per_kilowatt} watts in 1 kilowatt, then John uses {monthly_watt_hours}/{watts_per_kilowatt} = <<{monthly_watt_hours}/{watts_per_kilowatt}={monthly_kwh}>>{monthly_kwh}.
